math

Class Structure3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • math.Value3D
      • math.Structure3D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Base, Bullet, Gun

    public abstract class Structure3D
extends Value3D
    Class that represents a structure in 3D space- has properties for motion, and also has dimension
    Version:
    May 5, 2018
    Author:
    Nikash Walia, Period: 2, Assignment: Tanks, Sources: None

    • Constructor Detail

      • Structure3D

        public Structure3D(double x,
                   double y,
                   double z,
                   double angle,
                   int l,
                   int w,
                   int h,
                   double maxangularvel)
        Constructor for Structure3D
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of center
        y - y-coordinate of center
        z - z-coordinate of center
        angle - angle of structure
        l - length of structure
        w - width of structure
        h - height of structure
        maxangularvel - the rate at which the structure can rotate

        public abstract int hasCollided(Structure3D other)
        method for checking whether or not the structure has collided with another
        Parameters:
        other - structure to check against
        Returns:
        corner that has collided, or -1 if no collision

      • onCollision

        public abstract int onCollision(Structure3D other)

        Parameters:
        other - structure to interact with
        Returns:
        status update to system

      • collisionSide

        public abstract int collisionSide(Structure3D other,
                                  int corner)
        method for finding which side the other collided with
        Parameters:
        other - structure to check side against
        corner - the corner that has collided with this
        Returns:
        side of collision- starts from 0, increases counter-clockwise
